channel.title: Meta on Arian's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Meta on Arian's blog

item.title: My first post
item.description:
Hi,

I frankly don’t know where to begin, but I am glad you somehow found your way here.

Why

The entire reason behind me starting this was a braindump. You may share the same experience of gulping down a large amount of coffee, flexing your fingers, and browsing the web or frantically coding away at your mechanical keyboard.

Whatever it may be, many of those great days (and nights) ended up being wasted for not writing down what I did, learned, discovered, regretted, etc.
